text: Would you like to say hello in person one day Guian? You're very welcome to come and visit Union <http://www.unionvfx.com|www.unionvfx.com> and we can have coffee or go for lunch and have a chat - my shout! :slightly_smiling_face:
Yes of course!! I would love to meet you. I'm  free Monday or tuesday next week so I can come on those days if that s alright.:smile:

Great.  Tuesday would suit me.  Do you want to come at 12.30?  I can show you around and then take you for some lunch. I'm 18 Rathbone Place, London W1T 1HX. Nearest Tubes are Tottenham Court Road (Central/Northern), Goodge Street (Northern) and Oxford Circus (Central/Victoria).
